resources.string:
Developers: Daniel Davis, Dalton Claxton, Peyton White 

Sounds: https://freesound.org

Images: https://cleanpng.com

Board pieces: https://github.com/j-san

1. Simon will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal by pressing the same button.

 3. Simon will duplicate the first signal and will add one.

 4. Repeat these two signals by pressing the same buttons.

 5. Simon will duplicate these signals and add one.

 6. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each sequence correctly.

 7. If you fail to repeat a sequence exactly, the game is over.

1. Simon will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal and add one more.

 3. Continue repeating the previous signals and increasing the sequence by one as long as you can do so correctly.

 4. If you fail to repeat your own sequence correctly, the game is over.

1. Simon will give the first signal.

 2. Repeat the signal by pressing the same button.

 3. Simon will duplicate the first signal and will add one.

 4. Repeat these two signals by pressing the same buttons in REVERSE order.

 5. Simon will duplicate these signals and add one.

 6. Continue in this manner as long as you can repeat each sequence in reverse correctly!
